verses.verse: Now these<WH428> are the kings<WH4428> of the land,<WH776> which<WH834> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> smote,<WH5221> and possessed<WH3423> <WH853> their land<WH776> on the other side<WH5676> Jordan<WH3383> toward the rising<WH4217> of the sun,<WH8121> from the river<WH4480> <WH5158> Arnon<WH769> unto<WH5704> mount<WH2022> Hermon,<WH2768> and all<WH3605> the plain<WH6160> on the east: <WH4217>

Sihon <WH5511> king<WH4428> of the Amorites,<WH567> who dwelt<WH3427> in Heshbon,<WH2809> and ruled<WH4910> from Aroer,<WH4480> <WH6177> which<WH834> is upon<WH5921> the bank<WH8193> of the river<WH5158> Arnon,<WH769> and from the middle<WH8432> of the river,<WH5158> and from half<WH2677> Gilead,<WH1568> even unto<WH5704> the river<WH5158> Jabbok,<WH2999> which is the border<WH1366> of the children<WH1121> of Ammon;<WH5983>

And from the plain<WH6160> to<WH5704> the sea<WH3220> of Chinneroth<WH3672> on the east,<WH4217> and unto<WH5704> the sea<WH3220> of the plain,<WH6160> even the salt<WH4417> sea<WH3220> on the east,<WH4217> the way<WH1870> to Beth-jeshimoth;<WH1020> and from the south,<WH4480> <WH8486> under<WH8478> Ashdoth-pisgah: <WH798>
And the coast<WH1366> of Og<WH5747> king<WH4428> of Bashan,<WH1316> which was of the remnant<WH4480> <WH3499> of the giants,<WH7497> that dwelt<WH3427> at Ashtaroth<WH6252> and at Edrei,<WH154>

And reigned<WH4910> in mount<WH2022> Hermon,<WH2768> and in Salcah,<WH5548> and in all<WH3605> Bashan,<WH1316> unto<WH5704> the border<WH1366> of the Geshurites<WH1651> and the Maachathites,<WH4602> and half<WH2677> Gilead,<WH1568> the border<WH1366> of Sihon<WH5511> king<WH4428> of Heshbon.<WH2809>

Them did Moses<WH4872> the servant<WH5650> of the LORD<WH3068> and the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> smite:<WH5221> and Moses<WH4872> the servant<WH5650> of the LORD<WH3068> gave<WH5414> it for a possession<WH3425> unto the Reubenites,<WH7206> and the Gadites,<WH1425> and the half<WH2677> tribe<WH7626> of Manasseh.<WH4519>

And these<WH428> are the kings<WH4428> of the country<WH776> which<WH834> Joshua<WH3091> and the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> smote<WH5221> on this side<WH5676> Jordan<WH3383> on the west,<WH3220> from Baal-gad<WH4480> <WH1171> in the valley<WH1237> of Lebanon<WH3844> even unto<WH5704> the mount<WH2022> Halak,<WH2510> that goeth up<WH5927> to Seir;<WH8165> which Joshua<WH3091> gave<WH5414> unto the tribes<WH7626> of Israel<WH3478> for a possession<WH3425> according to their divisions;<WH4256>

In the mountains,<WH2022> and in the valleys,<WH8219> and in the plains,<WH6160> and in the springs,<WH794> and in the wilderness,<WH4057> and in the south<WH5045> country; the Hittites,<WH2850> the Amorites,<WH567> and the Canaanites,<WH3669> the Perizzites,<WH6522> the Hivites,<WH2340> and the Jebusites: <WH2983>
The king<WH4428> of Jericho,<WH3405> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Ai,<WH5857> which<WH834> is beside<WH4480> <WH6654> Bethel,<WH1008> one;<WH259>
The king<WH4428> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Hebron,<WH2275> one;<WH259>
The king<WH4428> of Jarmuth,<WH3412> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Lachish,<WH3923> one;<WH259>
The king<WH4428> of Eglon,<WH5700> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Gezer,<WH1507> one;<WH259>
The king<WH4428> of Debir,<WH1688> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Geder,<WH1445> one;<WH259>
The king<WH4428> of Hormah,<WH2767> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Arad,<WH6166> one;<WH259>
The king<WH4428> of Libnah,<WH3841> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Adullam,<WH5725> one;<WH259>
The king<WH4428> of Makkedah,<WH4719> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Bethel,<WH1008> one;<WH259>
The king<WH4428> of Tappuah,<WH8599> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Hepher,<WH2660> one;<WH259>
The king<WH4428> of Aphek,<WH663> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Lasharon,<WH8289> one;<WH259>
The king<WH4428> of Madon,<WH4068> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Hazor,<WH2674> one;<WH259>
The king<WH4428> of Shimron-meron,<WH8112> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Achshaph,<WH407> one;<WH259>
The king<WH4428> of Taanach,<WH8590> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Megiddo,<WH4023> one;<WH259>
The king<WH4428> of Kedesh,<WH6943> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of Jokneam<WH3362> of Carmel,<WH3760> one;<WH259>
The king<WH4428> of Dor<WH1756> in the coast<WH5299> of Dor,<WH1756> one;<WH259> the king<WH4428> of the nations<WH1471> of Gilgal,<WH1537> one;<WH259>
The king<WH4428> of Tirzah,<WH8656> one:<WH259> all<WH3605> the kings<WH4428> thirty<WH7970> and one.<WH259>
